artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 455; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 291.

dimension:
14 3/16 × 28 3/16 in. (36.04 × 71.6 cm) (image, assembled, vertical ōban triptych)
14 5/8 × 28 11/16 in. (37.15 × 72.87 cm) (sheet)
markings: Artist’s seals: 大蘇 {Taiso}, 芳年 {Yoshitoshi}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Rare deluxe edition with additional grass on left sheet and parallel clouds in diagonal direction.
title: By Request, Picture of Fujiwara Yasumasa Playing the Flute by Moonlight, a Painting Shown at the Exhibition for the Advancement of Painting in Autumn 1882
